Uses of Interface
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ContigBuilder

  • Packages that use ContigBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly
    The assembly package contains objects for working with genomic data that has been assembled into Contigs and Scaffolds.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm
    Contains Classes and interfaces to work with Celera Assembler data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.ace
    This package contains classes for handling Contigs stored in the Ace File Format.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.contig
    This package contains classes that can read and write TIGR .contig formatted contig data (also known as .ctg format).
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm
    This package contains classes to handle TIGR Assembler formatted assembly files.
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly  

    • Uses of ContigBuilder in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly

      Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly that implement ContigBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractContigBuilder<P extends AssembledRead,C extends Contig<P>>
      AbstractContigBuilder implements the ContigBuilder interface
      Methods in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly that return ContigBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContigBuilder<P,C> AbstractContigBuilder.addAllReads(Iterable<P> reads)
      Adds all the given reads to this contig.
      ContigBuilder<R,C> ContigBuilder.addAllReads(Iterable<R> reads)
      Adds all the given reads to this contig.
      ContigBuilder<R,C> ContigBuilder.addRead(R placedRead)
      Add the given AssembledRead read to this contig with the given values.
      ContigBuilder<P,C> AbstractContigBuilder.recallConsensus(ConsensusCaller consensusCaller)
      Recall the consensus using the given ConsensusCaller using faked quality data where all basecalls (and gaps) all get the same quality value.
      ContigBuilder<R,C> ContigBuilder.recallConsensus(ConsensusCaller consensusCaller)
      Recall the consensus using the given ConsensusCaller using faked quality data where all basecalls (and gaps) all get the same quality value.
      ContigBuilder<P,C> AbstractContigBuilder.recallConsensus(ConsensusCaller consensusCaller, QualitySequenceDataStore qualityDataStore, GapQualityValueStrategy qualityValueStrategy)
      Recall the consensus using the given ConsensusCaller and QualitySequenceDataStore which contains the quality data for all of the reads in this contig.
      ContigBuilder<R,C> ContigBuilder.recallConsensus(ConsensusCaller consensusCaller, QualitySequenceDataStore qualityDataStore, GapQualityValueStrategy qualityValueStrategy)
      Recall the consensus using the given ConsensusCaller and QualitySequenceDataStore which contains the quality data for all of the reads in this contig.
      ContigBuilder<P,C> AbstractContigBuilder.recallConsensusNow()
      Recompute the contig consensus now using the current reads in the contig using the ConsensusCaller and optional quality data that was set by AbstractContigBuilder.recallConsensus(ConsensusCaller) or AbstractContigBuilder.recallConsensus(ConsensusCaller, QualitySequenceDataStore, GapQualityValueStrategy).
      ContigBuilder<R,C> ContigBuilder.recallConsensusNow()
      Recompute the contig consensus now using the current reads in the contig using the ConsensusCaller and optional quality data that was set by recallConsensus(ConsensusCaller) or recallConsensus(ConsensusCaller, QualitySequenceDataStore, GapQualityValueStrategy).
      ContigBuilder<P,C> AbstractContigBuilder.removeRead(String readId)
      Remove the read with the given read id from this contig.
      ContigBuilder<R,C> ContigBuilder.removeRead(String readId)
      Remove the read with the given read id from this contig.
      ContigBuilder<P,C> AbstractContigBuilder.setContigId(String contigId)
      Change the contig id to the given id.
      ContigBuilder<R,C> ContigBuilder.setContigId(String contigId)
      Change the contig id to the given id.

    • Uses of ContigBuilder in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.ace

      Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.ace that implement ContigBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AceContigBuilder
      Builder for AceContigs that allows creating AceContig objects read by read by adding assembled reads and setting a consensus.
